name: Dream Mirror VR
description:
You are transported to a magical world where you can Interact with immersive environments to solve challenging puzzles. Where you get to find different types of mystical ancient devices in the form of keys, which will help you to open portals to different worlds.

Player Story

When I first stepped into my new home I felt it had something mysterious.

Then discovering the rooms, I came across a bracelet that had a strange green stone, I put it on my hand and it felt like it was mine forever.

Suddenly, the stone began to shine very brightly, curious about my new finding, I touched it and a chill came over me after which I saw nothing and I woke up in a treasure room,

where I found a papyrus with inscriptions about a shining stone and a pedestal, I immediately understood that I had to put the stone on the pedestal. Suddenly the room began to shake, the inscriptions shining a brilliant light through out the room and a pillar

with a mirror in the middle appeared as if it were a window to another world ...

Mythology

In an ancient temple fill with unseen treasures, I found a tablet that had a carved text:

"Those who place the stone on the pedestal will invoke a magic mirror, in the mirror you will see a different world, step into the mirror to instantly travel to that world and if it is too much for you use the ancient wristband to travel back to the forgotten temple of RA."

Key features
  • Listen to your own music, inside the game via built in music player
  • Explore the vast Space Station which revolves around the Earths Orbit.
  • Visit Artistic Italian styled islands with a coastal beach with an enjoyable balloon ride. Were you can get a full top down scenic view of the complete island and experience the most beautiful underwater.
  • Experience polygon style Amazing farms with big trees and forest.
  • Artistic scenic castle with torture devices and realistic fearful stereo sound effects to your mood.
  • Mystical Egyptian tomb on the banks of the Nile surrounded by pyramids like settlements.
  • Modern house for you to relax enjoy the couch or play darts you can also doodle with chalks.
  • Spiritual forest with lots of animals like deer, rabbits, butterfly and Even God rays !!
  • View an alien planet with alien life forms and an enjoy the immersive experience.
  • Discover many different animals including Deer, Sharks, Butterflies, Rabbits, Fish, Birds and many more...
  • Explore a range of locomotion options including blink teleport, seamless movement and snap rotation.
  • Each environment has been carefully crafted to influence specific emotional states
  • Turn off the music and experience a world filled with the calming, soothing sounds of nature
Notes
  • This game and was inspired from Stargate SG1 and my first VR experience Oculus Dreamdeck Demo and it aims for quality and not quantity.
  • Children and family friendly content
